title: ICE on checking function arguments

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
PR introducing this ICE: #92364 cc @jackh726 Line producing this ICE: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/b6c87c555f3b664f558d137d5f7696a07488157e/compiler/rustc_typeck/src/check/fn_ctxt/checks.rs#L430-L432 My attempt at an explanation: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/92364#discussion_r862811543 First discovered by Clippy's integration tests: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/runs/6212887812?check_suite_focus=true#step:7:22 Can also be reproduced by running `cargo +nightly-2022-05-01 check --all-targets --all-features` on `chalk`. ### Code ```Rust fn f(_: usize, _: &usize, _: usize) {} fn arg() -> T { todo!() } fn main() { let x = arg(); // `x` must be inferred f(&x, ""); // The reference on `&x` is important to reproduce the ICE } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.62.0-nightly (4dd8b420c 2022-05-01) binary: rustc commit-hash: 4dd8b420c027001e47b0d811a7e55e2fe1de1395 commit-date: 2022-05-01 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.62.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.1 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 2 but the index is 2', compiler/rustc_typeck/src/check/fn_ctxt/checks.rs:432:35 ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f3fd53aa07d - ::fmt::h9c26f6d747d94a70 1: 0x7f3fd5405a29 - core::fmt::write::he6178b15419e3012 2: 0x7f3fd53781f1 - std::io::Write::write_fmt::h96a5da5cbc7c4d6f 3: 0x7f3fd538245e - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::hee49b64dd69b207b 4: 0x7f3fd5382081 - std::panicking::default_hook::h4d10a189bd02c5c2 5: 0x7f3fd5ddc04a - core[f112b56ca3ff41e2]::ops::function::Fn<(&'a core[f112b56ca3ff41e2]::panic::panic_info::PanicInfo<'b>,), Output = ()> + core[f112b56ca3ff41e2]::marker::Send + core[f112b56ca3ff41e2]::marker::Sync> as core[f112b56ca3ff41e2]::ops::function::Fn<(&core[f112b56ca3ff41e2]::panic::panic_info::PanicInfo,)>>::call at /home/pkrones/rust-lang/rust/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1880:9 6: 0x7f3fd5ddc04a -
